title: (x) Laugh Out Loud Improv Theatre logo - Techno {Tiff}
content:
A guy made a logo for our college comedy group a while back, but I don’t know what font it is.

Could anyone please tell me what font this logo is?

Is the subhead on the logo the same font? It looks like maybe it is, but stretched funny.

Also, if you know where I can get it for a PC (preferably for free), that would be awesome.

Thanks!!!

Kenny

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [laugh out loud full.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060716093909/http:/typophile.com/files/laugh%20out%20loud%20full.jpg) | 15.59 KB |
author: puns0steel

comments.content:
Good thing it’s not Rapunsel :-)

ChrisL
wow that was fast. So, it’s just called Techno? Do you know where I can get it for a PC?
Oops, sorry about that. You can get it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060716093909/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/techno/).
Actually, you can’t purchase it. It’s an Apple proprietary font.
You could substitute [Truth](http://web.archive.org/web/20060716093909/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=B.121677.0.0), which is David Berlow’s update of Charcoal, a related Apple font.
Which looks just as crappy, and this isn’t David’s fault at all. The base material is just so poor. I really can’t believe so many people use either Techno or Charcoal.
